unnormalised: Arre yaar, tailor-an ata phone kelo. Taka salwar kameezak 2.5 meter kapod zai, ani dupattak anik 1.75 meter. Tech bhair, maka zai aslolem lace fokot 2-inch rundayint mellta mhonn tannem sanglem, mhonnun maka sumar 10 meter zai poddtto! Mhaka Chandni Chowkant sogllem mellto mhonn umed asa. Na zalear, hea saree-k blouse, fall ani petticoatak 6.25 meter zai poddtto. Ani visor naka, tannem lining material 500 gram hadd mhonnunui sanglam. Shopping korpak kall lagtolo!
normalised: Arre yaar, tailor-an phone kelo. Taka salwar kameezak don point panch meter kapodd zai, ani dupattak anik ek point saat panch meter. Ani, taka zai axilli lace fokot don inch rundayent melltta mhonn sanglam, mhunnun maka sumar dha meter mellovchi poddteli! Mhaka umed asa Chandni Chowkant sogllem mellttlem mhunn. Na zalear, hea saree-ak blouse, fall ani petticoatak sah point don panch meter zai poddteli. Ani visor naka, tannem panchxe gram lining material vhor mhunn sanglam. Shopping korunk kitlo vell lagtolo konn zanna!
